import React from "react"; import "./TweetInFeed.css"; import golf from "../images/golf.png"; import canoe from "../images/canoe.png"; import { defaultImgs } from "../defaultimgs"; import { Icon } from "web3uikit"; import { useMoralis } from "react-moralis"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const TweetInFeed = ({ profile }) => { const [tweetArr, setTweetArr] = useState(); const { Moralis, account } = useMoralis(); useEffect(() => { async function getTweets() { try { const Tweets = Moralis.Object.extend("Tweets"); const query = new Moralis.Query(Tweets); if (profile) { query.equalTo("tweeterAcc", account); } const results = await query.find(); setTweetArr(results); console.log(results); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } } getTweets(); }, [profile]); return ( <> {tweetArr?.map((e, key) => { console.log(key) return ( <>
{e.attributes.tweeterUserName.slice(0, 6)}
{ `${e.attributes.tweeterAcc.slice(0, 4)}...${e.attributes.tweeterAcc.slice(38)} Â· ${e.attributes.createdAt.toLocaleString('en-us', { month: 'short' })} ${e.attributes.createdAt.toLocaleString('en-us', { day: 'numeric' })} ` }
{e.attributes.tweetTxt} {e.attributes.tweetImg && ( )}
{ console.log(document.getElementById(`comment`+key).firstChild.firstChild.childNodes[1].attributes[1].value) document.getElementById(`comment`+key).firstChild.firstChild.childNodes[1].attributes[1].value = "#3f3f3f" }}> 12
); }).reverse()} {/*
